title: a lil bug with key fragments
body:
Whenever I get a key fragmen there is a pop-up and if I shut down my client and than log in again the pop-up will happen again
it is just a minor bug but I got 3 key fragments yesterday and It was annoying
I haven't noticed anything else yet

replies.body: Hey!  We're aware of the bug and attempting to implement a fix in the next patch.  Thanks for being diligent!
